alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 01 at 1:31PM AKDT until September 02 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 mph with gusts 35 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Middle Tanana Valley. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Trees could be blown down and power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southwest winds are now gusting to 35 mph. Gusts could increase to 40 mph this evening and continue into Saturday morning. Winds this strong combined with the rain soaked soil could cause some trees to blow over and cause power outages today through Saturday. Winds are expected to decrease Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
